main event: A group of witnesses in Sacramento, California observed an unidentified flying object that seemed to have disappeared leaving a glowing, ladder-like trail.
interesting points: The object was described as having a flat triangular shape with a white light similar to a 100 watt bulb., The UFO was observed moving at a good speed along a linear path, changing direction while in view., All seven occupants of the household witnessed the UFO and had consistent reports that it was not an aircraft., The sighting lasted for about 50 minutes with the object being visible for 30 to 60 seconds every 10 minutes., The observer noted that the object appeared to be further away when it disappeared, yet left behind illuminated rings.
